original_text: We must go to the Jordan River to cut down some trees. Each one of us can bring back some wood to build a new place for us to meet in.’ Elisha agreed and he told them to go. Kings 5 Kings 7
korean_text: 우리가 요단으로 가서 거기서 각각 한 재목을 가져다가 그 곳에 우리가 거주할 처소를 세우사이다 하니 엘리사가 이르되 가라 하는지라

sentences.original_text: We must go to the Jordan River
Each one of us can bring back some wood
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 각자는 나무를 가져올 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: to build a new place for us to meet in
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 만나 새로운 장소를 건설하기 위해

sentences.original_text: and he told them to go
